hero.title: Flovers
hero.subtitle: Care for your plants with clarity, routines, and history.
hero.purpose: Add your plants, link species definitions for guidance, define recurring reminders, and track care history, with optional live sensor monitoring and QR-based access to plant details.

cta.title: Start simple. Keep the routine consistent.
cta.subtitle: Add your plants, link definitions for guidance, set recurring reminders, and let Flovers generate tasks automatically. Use daily notifications to stay on track, scan QR labels to jump straight to a plant, and optionally validate routines with live sensor readings.

how.title: How it works
how.subtitle: A simple loop: add → define → act → stay consistent. Flovers keeps the routine moving so you can focus on the plants, not the planning.

s1.title: Add a plant by recognizing it or searching the database
s1.text: Create a plant in seconds. Search the 700+ plant definition database or use photo recognition to get a suggested match. Once added, care routines, tasks, and history stay linked to this single plant instance.

s2.title: Link a definition, set context, and get sensible intervals
s2.text: Connect the plant to a definition to unlock care traits and defaults. Add real-world context like pot size, soil type, location, and light level. Based on this, Flovers helps calculate realistic reminder intervals that you can adjust anytime.

s3.title: Complete tasks quickly and build a clean care history
s3.text: Reminders automatically generate due tasks. Home shows what’s due, while the plant page shows full context. When you complete a task, you can add notes, and Flovers queues the next one so the routine keeps running without manual planning.

s4.title: Stay on track with daily notifications
s4.text: Choose push or email notifications in Profile settings and set a delivery time. You’ll get a daily summary of tasks due today, with optional follow-ups if tasks become overdue, so nothing quietly slips through.

header.title: Features that keep care consistent
header.subtitle: Flovers is built around a few practical features: smart starter intervals, tasks from reminders, daily notifications, QR shortcuts, and optional IoT readings—so you can keep plants healthy without thinking too hard about it.

intervals.title: Suggested intervals from plant definitions
intervals.text: Link a plant to a definition and Flovers suggests starter intervals based on the species and your setup. Accept them, tweak them, or keep your own cadence.

tasks.title: Reminders that turn into tasks
tasks.text: Set a recurring reminder (watering, misting, fertilising, repotting, care). Flovers turns it into due tasks. When you complete one, the next gets queued automatically.

notifications.title: Daily notifications by push or email
notifications.text: Choose push or email in Profile settings. Flovers can send a daily summary at your chosen time (e.g., 14:00) with today’s due tasks, and optionally follow up ~24h later if tasks are overdue.

qr.title: QR scan to jump straight to the plant
qr.text: Print a QR code for a plant and attach it to the pot. Scan to open Plant Details instantly—fastest way to check context and mark care done.

iot.title: Live IoT readings with trends
iot.text: Connect your ESP/Arduino device and send readings like temperature, humidity, light, and soil moisture. The app shows daily/weekly/monthly charts so you can spot patterns and adjust routines.

core.title: The two things Flovers does best
core.lead: A solid plant database and quick photo recognition. Pick a match, link it once, and you’ve got a clean starting point for caring for your plants.

defs.title: 700+ plant definitions with real care details
defs.desc: Browse definitions with photos and key traits. Link your plant to a definition and Flovers can guide you with sensible defaults.
bullets: Care traits like light, soil, watering style, humidity, temperature.
Helpful starting point that you can tweak as you learn your space.
Quick linking so each plant has a clear baseline.

recognition.title: Photo recognition that suggests the closest match
recognition.desc: Snap a photo or upload one and Flovers suggests what it looks like. Choose the best match, link it, and move on.
bullets: Works best with clear, well lit photos.
Shows a few close options so you can pick the right one.
Built to save time, not to lock you into a guess.

qr.title: QR scanning: the physical shortcut
qr.lead: Generate a QR code for each plant, print it, attach it to the pot, then scan to jump straight into that plant’s details and tasks.

image.alt: Scanning a plant QR code with the Flovers app

create.title: Create → print → attach
create.text: Each plant instance has its own ID. In Plant Details you can generate a QR code for that plant, save it to your phone, or send it by email so you can print it and stick it on the pot.

scan.title: Scan → confirm → open Plant Details
scan.text: Use the built-in QR scanner. After the backend confirms the code, you’re redirected to that exact plant’s details—tasks, reminders, notes, readings, and full context.

care.title: Care in the moment
care.text: Water the plant, scan the label, and mark the task as complete—or just scan to check whether anything is due. A direct link between the physical plant and your data.
